name: Kanto S2 - Stand for speaker(s) - aluminum, foam - black - desktop stand (pack of 2) | Dell USA
description: S2 speaker stands are the perfect addition to your desktop speaker setup. With 16° of vertical tilt, the S2 stand ensures that you experience the full range of frequencies that your speakers have to offer. Constructed out of aluminum, these solid stands include multiple areas of foam padding that not only provide adequate grip, but also help to reduce vibration when you have your speakers cranked up.
